What is the capital of France?.rca: The issue was raised with a customer asking for the capital of France.
What is the capital of France?.solution: The capital of France is Paris.

What is the currency of Japan?.rca: Customer asked for the currency of Japan.
What is the currency of Japan?.solution: The currency of Japan is the Yen.

What is the currency of India?.rca: Customer asked for the currency of India.
What is the currency of India?.solution: The currency of India is the Rupees.

Why did the system crash?.rca: Memory overflow due to excessive data load
Why did the system crash?.solution: Increase memory allocation and optimize data processing

Why is the API rate-limited?.rca: Too many requests within a short time period
Why is the API rate-limited?.solution: Implement rate-limiting with retries and exponential backoff

Why are orders not syncing with the ware.rca: API connection issues due to timeout errors
Why are orders not syncing with the ware.solution: Increase the timeout threshold and retry failed requests
